summary: The module supplies a collection of custom Django user models and associated managers used exclusively in authentication test suites. Each model demonstrates a different customization scenario—email as the unique identifier, extended AbstractUser with temporary detachment of group/permission relations, alternative email field name, inclusion of a foreign‑key relationship, and integer‑based usernames—while preserving standard permission handling.
business_intent: Enable comprehensive testing of authentication mechanisms by providing varied user model configurations that mimic real‑world customizations, allowing test cases to verify login, permission, and user‑creation logic across different schema designs.
